promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive legendary fox fire-type pokemon with dark fur. It can be found in volcano-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or fox. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Pyrolynx, a a massive legendary fox fire-type pokemon. It can be found in volcano-like environments It has the following abilities: Scorching Breath, Scorching Column. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "fox", "fire" or "Pyrolynx". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, fox-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lava texture background
generatedDescription: "A legend dwelling in molten terrains, Pyrolynx harnesses magma’s roar to project Scorching Breath and Column. It stokes the earth's inner flame."
